      • newInstance

        public static CurrencyAmount newInstance(double val,
                         Currency currency)
        Convenience constructor. NB: Using doubles for money is inherently risky. Doubles have a potentially lossy representation that can lead to inaccuracies. Consult the java language specification for details on floating point representations.
        Parameters:
        val - Amount that will be converted to BigDecimal
        currency - The currency of the instance.

      • newInstance

        public static CurrencyAmount newInstance(float val,
                         Currency currency)
        Convenience constructor. NB: Using floats for money is inherently risky. Floats have a potentially lossy representation that can lead to inaccuracies. Consult the java language specification for details on floating point representations.
        Parameters:
        val - Amount that will be converted to BigDecimal
        currency - The currency of the instance.

        public static CurrencyAmount newInstance(java.math.BigInteger unscaledVal,
                         int scale,
                         Currency currency)
        Convenience constructor
        Parameters:
        unscaledVal - Non-null amount that will, along with scale, be converted to BigDecimal

        currency - The currency of the instance.
